alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 4:21PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Elevated Surf Norton Sound Coast Tonight Into Tuesday... South winds gusting 30 to 40 mph over Norton Sound tonight will cause elevated surf from Golovin to the Bering Strait tonight into Tuesday morning. This could cause minor beach erosion between Golovin and the Bering Strait tonight. Winds turn west and gusting 30 mph on Tuesday will cause surf to decrease from Golovin west Tuesday afternoon. Surf will increase from Koyukuk to St Michael on Tuesday afternoon as the winds turn more onshore there. This could cause minor beach erosion between Koyukuk and St Michael Golovin Tuesday afternoon and evening.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast
